annotations.description: Sample Spring Boot helloworld built with maven

parameters.description: Custom hostname for service routes.  Leave blank for default hostname, e.g.: <application-name>.<project>.<default-domain-suffix>
parameters.name: APPLICATION_HOSTNAME

parameters.description: Application options. These options will be passed to the Spring Boot command line
parameters.name: APP_OPTIONS
